description: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) forecasts the southwest monsoon's retreat from northwest India around September 15, slightly ahead of schedule. This year's monsoon arrived early in Kerala on May 24 and quickly covered the entire country by June 29. Overall, India has experienced 7.4% above-normal rainfall, although the east and northeast regions faced deficits.

description: Charlie Kirk's assassination has sparked debate, with conservatives mourning him as a culture warrior and liberals criticizing his "Professors Watchlist." This list, targeting academics deemed leftist, led to harassment and threats, particularly against women and minority scholars. While Trump condemns left-wing violence, critics argue Kirk fostered a climate of intimidation, making his legacy a complex and controversial issue.

Who is Tyler Robinson? Suspect arrested over Charlie Kirk’s murder
description: Tyler Robinson, a 22-year-old from Utah, has been apprehended in connection with the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. President Trump confirmed the arrest, stating the suspect was identified and turned in by an acquaintance. Kirk was fatally shot while addressing a crowd at Utah Valley University, prompting a massive investigation and outpouring of tips.

Amazon suspends engineer; sent 'threatening' letter to CEO: Left no choice
description: Amazon has suspended a Palestinian software engineer for criticizing its business ties with Israel, specifically the Project Nimbus cloud computing contract. Ahmed Shahrour's internal communications expressing opposition led to his suspension and an ongoing investigation. He alleges the company suppresses pro-Palestinian voices, a claim Amazon denies, while similar protests have resulted in terminations at Microsoft and Google.

title: H3N2 Flu Alert in Delhi: All about the viral infection, symptoms and recovery period
description: Delhi is currently grappling with an outbreak of the H3N2 flu, a virulent strain of influenza A. Health officials are urging residents to be vigilant, recognizing symptoms such as severe fever, persistent cough, and body aches. Early detection and medical consultation are crucial for effective management and prevention of potential complications, especially for vulnerable populations.

title: India-US trade war: Russian crude supply 'too significant'; limited impact of sanctions
description: Despite Western pressure and potential sanctions, India and China's demand for Russian crude oil remains strong, according to Vortexa. Russian crude maintains a significant, price-competitive presence in these markets.

title: NFL at Lambeau: Fans slam Charlie Kirk tribute; ‘That wasn’t even a moment’
description: The NFL and Green Bay Packers honored Charlie Kirk with a moment of silence before facing the Washington Commanders. Fans called it rushed and poorly executed, slamming the league for inconsistency compared to past public statements. Kirk, 31, was killed Wednesday in Utah. The tribute came as Trump vowed to award him the Presidential Medal of Freedom.

title: 'Submit to your husband': Charlie Kirk under fire after resurfaced rant about Taylor
description: Charlie Kirk's past remarks about Taylor Swift resurfaced following his death at Utah Valley University. In 2025, Kirk criticized Swift's engagement to Travis Kelce, urging her to reject feminism and submit to her husband. His comments, deemed sexist by many, have sparked renewed debate in light of his assassination and Swift's advocacy for women's rights.

title: Patrick Mahomes quiet after Charlie Kirk shooting; Randi Mahomes and Tavia Hunt speak out
description: Following the tragic shooting death of Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University, Patrick Mahomes has remained silent. Tavia Hunt, wife of the Chiefs owner, expressed grief and called for civility, a sentiment echoed by Patrick's mother, Randi Mahomes, who shared Tavia's post. The investigation into Kirk's death is ongoing, sparking renewed debate about violence.

title: Gemini app tops 10M users: Nano Banana fuels buzz; viral prompts to try
description: Google's Gemini app, featuring the AI image editing tool Nano Banana, has achieved over 10 million downloads shortly after its launch. Users have already created or modified over 200 million images, leveraging Nano Banana's speed and accuracy. Viral trends showcase the tool's versatility, allowing users to transform themselves into action figures, appear in different decades, and step into famous artworks.

title: Blake Lively ends friendship with Taylor Swift after singer's engagement
description: Reports indicate a rift between Taylor Swift and Blake Lively, with Lively seemingly accepting the end of their long-standing friendship. Sources suggest Lively is no longer preoccupied with Swift's life, particularly her engagement to Travis Kelce. Despite past attempts at reconciliation, Swift has remained unresponsive, and Lively is now focused on her own life.

title: Gabrielle Union opens up about her father’s hospital bills
description: Hollywood actress Gabrielle Union spoke about managing money. She highlighted hospital expenses and insurance issues. Union mentioned her father's memory care costs. She also spoke about choosing roles based on financial needs. Dwyane Wade's net worth is $170 million. Gabrielle Union's net worth is $40 million. They share expenses equally. The couple has been together for over ten years.
